bm_desc: Board Meeting Intimation for To Consider And Approve The Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results For 2Nd Quarter And Half Year Ended 30Th September, 2025
To consider bonus and other business matters
To consider interim dividend for the FY 2025-26
To consider buyback for equity shares and other business matters

To consider Fund Raising, discuss and decide various matters in connection with the Rights Issue, including but not limited to the specific terms of the Rights Issue, such as the determination of the Rights Issue price and related payment mechanism, rights entitlement ratio

SUPREMEINF : 28-Nov-2025 :  The Company has informed the Exchange that a Board meeting to be held on November 24, 2025 has been re-scheduled. Further, the Company has informed the Exchange that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on November 28, 2025,  To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended September 30, 2025
To consider and approve the financial results for the quarter and half-year ended September 30, 2025
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended September 30, 2025
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended September 30, 2025
To consider and approve Fund Raising by way of issue of Securities
To consider dividend and other business matters
To consider dividend and other business matters
To consider stock split of equity shares
To consider proposal for issuance of Bonus Issue of Equity shares
To consider and approve the financial results for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2025 and other business matters
